sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { TableRow, TableContentBox, TableContentBoxMiddle, TableContentBoxRight, DoneTextContainer, TextContainer, MessageContainer, Button, } from './elements' const ListItem = ({ item, resolveHandler, blockHandler }) => ( Id: {item.id} State: {item.state ? 'Resolved' : 'Open'} Details Type: {item.type} Message: {item.text} ) export default ListItem
